bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: a) anal bleeding. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry qian gen 茜根：吐血，瀉血用之 , “Use it for [treating] blood spitting and blood outflow ”.

b) Vaginal bleeding. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 42: 墮胎損經脈，損經脈，故血不止也。瀉血多者，便致煩悶，乃至死也 , “An abortion injures the conduit vessels. When the conduit vessels are injured this results in unending bleeding. Massive blood outflow leads to vexation and heart-pressure, and may end in death”.

c) Pus and, mostly, blood in one’s stools in the course of free-flux illness. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry niu jiao sai 牛角䚡：止冷痢瀉血 , “It ends cold free-flux illness with blood outflow ”. Xie xue nong 泄血膿 , outflow of blood and pus [1]

Illness Sign identical with bian nong xue 便膿血 , defecation with pus and blood. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry jiu 韭 quoting Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 止泄白膿 , “It ends outflow of white pus”, writes: 止泄 血膿 , “It ends outflow of blood and pus ”.
